ADD $$$ 0 00000000000000000000000000100000 dsta 1110 R
ADDI $$I 0 00100000000000000000000000000000 tsxx 1111 I

MULT $$ 0 00000000000000000000000000011000 stda 1100 R
DIV $$ 0 00000000000000000000000000011010 stda 1100 R
AND $$$ 0 00000000000000000000000000100100 stda 1110 R
OR $$$ 0 00000000000000000000000000100101 dsta 1110 R
XOR $$$ 0 00000000000000000000000000100110 dsta 1110 R
ROTR $$S 0 00000000001000000000000000000010 sdta 0111 R
SLL $$S 0 00000000000000000000000000000000 sdta 0111 R
SRL $$S 0 00000000000000000000000000000010 sdta 0111 R
SLT $$$ 0 00000000000000000000000000101010 dsta 1110 R
LUI $I 0 00111100000000000000000000000000 stxx 0111 I
MFHI $ 0 00000000000000000000000000010000 stda 0010 R
MFLO $ 0 00000000000000000000000000010010 stda 0010 R
BEQ $$R 0 00010000000000000000000000000000 stxx 1111 I
BNE $$R 0 00010100000000000000000000000000 stxx 1111 I
BGTZ $R 0 00011100000000000000000000000000 stxx 1011 I
BLEZ $R 0 00011000000000000000000000000000 stxx 1011 I
J A 0 00001000000000000000000000000000 xxxx 1111 J
JAL A 0 00001100000000000000000000000000 xxxx 1111 J
JR $ 0 00000000000000000000000000001000 stda 1001 R
